Certifications

pebkac

My personal I.T blog pebkac, have a look and see what I have been up to.

LittleKiwiBus

This is my girlfriends and my tinyhouse/housebus blog LittleKiwiBus, Come see how we have been progressing.

Parvoalert

Fully serverless data collection engine, able to serve and store thousands of users without breaking AWS' free tier (AKA its free). I architected, implememted and built the backend for this site.

BridgeDoctor

For this project, I containerised and de-coupled a PHP application from the the DB and migrated to AWS, This enabled the website to scale and self-heal automatically!
